item.description:
Billy Tse (http://www.billytserestaurant.com/id5.html) has restaurants in Revere and Boston's North End. Our North End meetup will be where Commercial Street meets Atlantic Avenue, diagonally across from Starbuck's near the Waterfront. The restaurant offers Chinese, Japanese and Sushi. Portions are very large and tasty. We'll begin with a cocktail hour at the bar from 6:00-7:00, for those who get there early. Please bring cash, as we will not get separate checks.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the bar until 7:00.
item.name: Billy Tse Restaurant-Asian Dinner
